title: So this is how the automated system works.
body:
So, to pre-face - My mid laner clearly banned my pick then proceeded to troll me in game. i said or did NOTHING wrong. but because he got the nice idea to troll me from the match lobby onwards and report ME for HIM trolling, i get muted. there is no other chat logs, this is 1 game only. So to sum this up, if you wanna really fuck someone, ban their picks, then troll them in game without saying much of anything, then report them after the games over. Congrats, you successfully fucked someone and nothing will be done to you, and they will get punished because you trolled them.

Im not here to argue if i did anything wrong, becuase i didnt and you opinion on it doesnt matter, i was there, you werent. - The moral of this story is riot endorses trolling your teammates, if you dont say much of anything in game, you can passive aggressivly troll people and tilt them off the face of the planet, then report them after to get them punished.

"ßåd: u cant troll someone
ßåd: then report them for u trolling them"

Lesson learned, but you CAN though, nice automated system u got there riot. i know what ill be doing form now on when someone fucks me over :)

End of the day - i should NOT have been punished for this - nothing i said was bad. called him a shit stain, but truth is truth. only a shit stain would intentionally ban his own teammates hovered pick when that pick isnt even something he has to worry about in his lane in any way shape or form. if anything, this kid should be the one being punished, he went OUT of his way to troll a teammate and IM the one who gets punished for him trolling?.... and now my honors are locked because of what? nothing?

replies.body:
As the OP has admitted they don't want feedback, this thread has been locked.

If you have questions or concerns about this action please visit us in the [Moderation Discord here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification).
 
~ Ulanopo
You say you did "nothing wrong," and yet you raged the entire time, including calling someone a "peice [sic] of garbage," a "shit stain," and an "asshole." That is why you were punished.

Hey, buddy. Nobody is required to agree with you, and nobody needs your permission to post or reply on a public forum. You came here, nobody came to you. As I've been telling another poster who vehemently disagrees with his punishment - our opinions don't matter. We didn't punish you, we can't lift it. Open a ticket with Riot and let us know if they agree and reverse their decision. I'd personally love to be proven wrong.
Just like you did in game, you think anyone who disagrees with you is trolling.

[DELETED CONTENT REMOVED - ULANOPO]


You do realize that I'm trying to help you avoid future punishments, right? I told you exactly what the problem was with your chat messages. If you keep that in mind for the future, you won't get chat restricted again. Isn't that good? Do you not like that?

Im in the same boat, i think the punishment results from 'typing' too much. I was in a game and i didnt realize it was a 4 man group, my mid laner had died 5 times and i was supp, i roamed mid to try to help when i saw them fighting but i didnt make it in time. He pings me like crazy and then starts verbally assaulting me. Him and the jungler then proceed to flame me the rest of the game, tell me if i dont FF they are all reporting me and they were calling me all choice swear words this entire time. I responded them but didnt say anything horrible, i did say he was feeding his lane but is yelling at me??? Because he was 1/5 but thats the worst thing i said the rest was just me asking for people to please report them or responding to them saying i was lvl 6 still because i was warding, or them saying i was trolling and me saying im not trolling, that im literally trying to play. They proceed to flame me in lobby and all 4 of them who are friends report me. I got a 10 game chat restriction and my honor is locked. I put in a ticket because its BS. Meanwhile i have gotten NO notification any of them got in trouble from the automatic system that usually pops up despite all the choice sexist swear words they called me.

Well if thats the case im glad I didnt spend anymore money on this game. I just began to play it again after being gone from it for nearly two years and been playing pretty hard the last month. Was considering dumping a bunch of money on RP when the yuumi patch hit to buy her and some other champs i still dont have and some skins, maybe some loot bundles but this only reminds me why i stopped playing. I do love the game itself, but the community is so toxic and its so unfair to get such an excessive punishment. Harsh reminder not to spend money or get too attached to this game and go back to something else. I miss the tribunal where actually people investigated reports.
